name: Energy Shield Slaughterhouse
description:
Energy Shield Slaughterhouse is a frantic 2D platforming shoot-em-up game where you have to constantly slaughter your enemies in order to survive. If you try to hide, your energy shield will slowly drain down to nothing and you will still die regardless. Try to get as high of a score as you can!

This game is a one-man project (despite that typo in the main menu) and one made of passion. However, don't let that stop you from giving me feedback on every aspect of the game! Maybe something that I'm fine with fixing later is actually a super critical issue and I just don't realize it as a developer!

Music by Waterflame - Lightspeed 
Patch notes and future plans: - https://docs.google.com/document/d/1sZDLHZfDEMnJpJ5zhH38PQfSqjNBnhwpWzD9iypCKbY/...
